Frequently Asked Questions

Who the eff is Kyle Guy?

Kyle Guy is a professional basketball player originally from Indianapolis. He currently plays for the G-League team affiliated with the Sacramento Kings.

Why do you even care about Kyle Guy?

One time I got the same haircut as him and then he won the Most Outstanding Player award in the NCAA Final Four. I thought that was pretty cool, so I started this Unofficial Kyle Guy Fan Club.

Why does the newsletter get sent out every hour?

Kyle Guy is really, really important and the fans need to know about everything Kyle Guy. This is why we send out an HOURLY Kyle Guy newsletter! Sign up for it in the section above our FAQs.
